Headline: #59 59th/61st Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 59th/Blackstone
ShortDescription: EB 9 59th/61st buses are temporarily rerouted via 59th, Dorchester, 60th, Woodlawn, Midway Plaisance, & Dorchester, due to police activity at 59th/Blackstone.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Eastbound #59 59th/61st  buses are temporarily rerouted via 59th, Dorchester, 60th, Woodlawn, Midway Plaisance, Dorchester, then resume their normal route, due to police activity at 59th/Blackstone.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Pink Line Service Delayed near Cicero
ShortDescription: Pink Line trains are standing near Cicero due to an unauthorized person on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Pink Line trains are standing near Cicero due to an unauthorized person on the tracks. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
